titles.title: Accountability in Student Loan Data Act of 2022
Accountability in Student Loan Data Act of 2022

To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to require that institutions of higher education maintain certain adjusted cohort default rates to participate in programs under title IV of such Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Accountability in Student Loan Data Act of 2022
This bill revises the method for calculating a cohort default rate (the measurement of how many borrowers default on their federal student loans within a certain time period), and it establishes penalties for institutions of higher education that have a certain percentage of graduates who default on their student loans.
